notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 1r) Sermo in natale domini

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 1r) Þæt halige godspell be ðære hean medomnysse

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 7r) ond rixiað to ƿidan ealdre. amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 7r) In nativitate Sancti Stephani protomartyris

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 7r) Ƿe rædað on ðære bec

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 12v) Nu to dæg hi underfengon stephanum blissiende on heora geferædenne mid þam he ƿuldrað ond blissað a on ecnysse. amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 12v) In assumptione sancti iohannis apostoli

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 12v) Iohannes se godspellere cristes dyrling

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 21r) þæs him getiðað drihten crist þam is ƿurðmynt ond ƿuldor mid fæder ond mid sunu ond mid halgum gaste a buton ende. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 21r) V. kalendas Ianuarias In natale innocentum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 21r) Nu to dæg godes gelaðung

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 27v) ond singað þone niƿan lof sang þam ælmihtigum gode to ƿurðmynte se ðe leofað ond rixað a buton ende. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 27v) Kalendis Ianuariis Circumcisio domini

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 27v) Se godspellere lucas be leac

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 34v) Sy him ƿuldor ond lof a on ecnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 34v) In epiphania domini

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 34v) Men ða leofestan nu for feaƿum dagum

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 43v) ond rixiað mid fæder ond halgum gaste on ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 43v) Dominica I post Theophania domini

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 44r) Monað us ond mengað

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 47r) ond rixiat mid fæder ond mid halgum gaste a to ƿidan feore. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 47r) Dominica II post Theophania domini

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): (fol. 47r) Nuptie facte

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 47r) Iohannes se godspellere cƿæð

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 57v) ond rixiað mid fæder ond mid sunu ond id þam halgan gaste in eallra ƿorulda ƿoruld a buton ende. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 57v) Dominica III post Theophania

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): (fol. 57v) Cum dscendissed

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 57v) Matheus se eadiga godspellere

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 64v) þæt hi synt ðry onhadum ond on namum ond an god on anre godcyndnysse æfre ƿuniende buton anginne ond ende. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 64v) IIII Nonus Februarias In purificatione Sancte Marie

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 64v) God bebead on ðære ealdan ae

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 73r) Ge þe leofað ond rixað a buton ende. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 73r) IIII Idus In natale Sancti Gregorii pape

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 73r) Gregorius se halga papa engliscre þeode apostol

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 81r) ond syððan onðisum dæge geƿat to ðam ecan setle heofonan rices on ðam he leofað mid gode ælmihtigum a on ecnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 81r) XIII kalendas aprili in natale Sancti Cuhtberhti Episcopi

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 81r) Cuðberhtus se halga bisceop

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 90r) Sy ƿuldor ond lof ðam ƿe legan drihtne se ðe his gecorenan sƿa cystelice ƿurðað æfter deadlicum life mid him libbendum a on ecnysse ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 90r) In natale Sancti Benedicti Abbatis

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 90r) Benedictus se halga abbud

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 103v) Sy him simle ƿuldor ond lof a on ecnysse mid eallum his halgum se ðe ana is unasæcgendlic god. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 103v) In adnuntiatione Sancte Marie

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 104r) Ure se ælmihtiga scyppend

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 110r) ond mid ðam halgum gaste a on ecnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 110r) Dominica in septuagessima

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): (fol. 110r) Simile est regnum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 110r) Se hælend cƿæð þæt heofonan rice

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 115v) Ƿe ƿillað eoƿ secgan

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 117r) on ðam ƿe him singað ecelice alleluan buton gesƿince. Amen

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 117r) Dominica in sexagessima

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): (fol. 117r) Cum turba plurima

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 117r) On sume tide ða ða micel meniu

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 122v) ond his halgum þæt ece lif habban moton on ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 122v) Dominica in quinquagessima

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): (fol. 122v) Assumpsit Iesus

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 122v) Her is geræd on ðisum godspelle

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 128v) þæt is eall folc þe þæt geseah herede god se ðe leofað ond rixað a buton ende. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 128v) Dominica in quadragessima

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 128v) Men ða leofostan eoƿ eallum is cuð

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 132v) mid ðam hi libbað ond rixiað onlic homan ond on saƿle on eallra ƿorulda ƿoruld a buton ende. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 132v) Dominica II quadragessima

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 132v) Men ða leofestan ic cyðe eoƿ þæt ðreo ðing

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 137r) þas ðing us gedefenað gefyllan mid ðæs fultume þe mid fæder ond mid sunu ond mid ðam halgum gaste leofað ond rixað þurh ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld a buton ende. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 137r) Dominica III in xl

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 137r) Geherað nu men ða leofostan hu ðas halgan bec

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 140v) þæt hi moton æfter ðam æriste habban þæt ece lif on neorxnaƿanges gefean mid fæder ond mid sunu ond mid ðam halgan gaste on ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld a buton ende. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 140v) Dominica IIII in xl

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 140v) Men ða leofestan ƿe ƿillað her sprecan feaƿum ƿordum

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 145r) ac ðær habbað ealle halige fulfremede lufe ond fullfremedne ƿillan mid fæder ond mid sunu ond mid halgum gaste. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 145r) Dominica V. in xl

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 145r) Men ða leofestan us is on ælcne sæl geornlice

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 149v) þæt he on fo þære ecan mede on heofonan rice þa us gegearƿig se drihten þe mid fæder ond mid sunu ond mid þam halgum gaste leofað ond rixað on ecnysse a buton ende. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 160r) Passio domini In ramis palmarum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): (fol. 160r) Passio domini nostri Iesu Christi secundum Matheum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 160r) Men ða leofestan þis is ures drhitnes þroƿung

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 166v) ond rixað mid fæder ond mid sunu ond mid ðam halgum gastes a in ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld soðlice buton ende. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 166v) Feria quinta in cena domini

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): (fol. 166v) De huius diei ueneratione et de domini misericordia in memoria aetene iohannes euangelista uenera

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 166v) Sægeð on ðisum bocum be ðære arƿurðnesse

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 174v) God us gefultumige þæt ƿe to him becuman moton se ðe leofað ond rixað a on ecnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 174v) Feria VI in parasceuen

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 174v) Hƿæt se ælmihtiga drihten

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 186v) his sylfes naman to ƿuldrienne ond to hergenne on ecum gefean ond on ecere engidnysse þurh eallra ƿurulda ƿoruld a buton ende. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 186v) De sabbato sancto

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 186v) Men ða leofestan ƿe magon hƿilcum hƿega ƿordum

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 196v) ond seo ðanc ƿurþere herenys a buton ende mealra ƿorulda ƿorulda. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 196v) Dominica in die Sancte pasce

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 196v) Oft ge gehydron ymbe þæs hælendes ærist

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 202r) ond rixað mid þam ælmihtigum fæder ond ðam halgum gaste nu on ecnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 202r) Dominica I post pascha

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 202r) Æfter þæs hælendes æriste

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 206v) ond beoð cuðe geðaðe ær cuðe ƿæron geðaðe uncuðe ƿæron ƿuniende on broðor licre lufe mid gode aon ecnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 206v) Dominica II post pascha

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 206v) Ðis godspell þe nu geræd ƿæs cyð

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 209r) ond rixað mid fæder ond mid ðam halgum gaste a on ecnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 209r) Kalendis maiis in natale apostolorum Philippi et Iacobi

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 209r) Philippus se godes apostol

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 211r) Ƿe ƿurðiað eac

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 213r) Se ðe ana rixað on ecnysse god. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 213r) v. Nonas kalendas Mai inuentio Sancte crucis

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 213r) Men ða leofestan nu to dæg ƿe ƿurðiað þære halgan rode

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 215r) ƿe hi ƿurðiað afor ƿurðynte cristes se ðe us alysde mid lufe þurh hi þæs ƿe him ðanciað simle on life. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 215r) Eodem die passio alexandri ueuenti et ðeodoli

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 215r) On ðisum dæge þroƿode

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 217v) Sy ðam ælmihtigan lof se ðe ana rixað a on ecnysse god. Amen.

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Men ða leofostan gelome eow is gesæd

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Hit is swiðe gedafenlic

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Gelome æteowde

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Cum audieritis.. Se hælende forsæde

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Homo quidam peregre.. Ure drihten sæde þis bispel

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Simile est regnum celorum decem uirginibus.. Se hælende sæde geomlice bigspell

notes.head: Text Language
notes.body: English

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 248r) In ascensione domini

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 248r) Lucas se godspellere us monade

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 253v) ond rixað mid þam ælmihtigum fæder ond þam halgan gaste a on ecnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 253v) In die pentecosten

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 253v) Fram þam halgan easterlican dæge

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 259v) þæt se ælmihtiga ƿealdend him sænde þa seofon fealdan gife his gastes se ðe leofað ond rixað a buton ende. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 259v) Dominica I post octavas pentecosten

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): (fol. 259v) Homo quidam erat diues

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 259v) Se ƿealdenda drihten sæde

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 263v) Se ðe leofað ond rixað on ecnysse mid þam ælmihtigan fæder ond ond þam halgan gaste hi þry on anre godcundnysse ƿunigende buton anginne ond ende a to ƿeorulde. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 263v) Dominica II post octavas pentecosten

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): (fol. 263v) Homo quidam fecit cenam magnam et reliqua

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 263v) Se hælend sæde þis bigspell

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 266r) Uton biddan þone ælmihtigan drihten þæt he us gebringe to his ecan gebeorscipe se ðe ðurh his tocyme þær to gelaðode.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial):

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 266r) Mine gebroðra ƿe ƿillað sume cristes rinda eoƿ gereccan

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 267v) ond gode geðeon þurh godre geheald sumnysse; þam sy ƿuldor ond ƿurðmynt a to ƿorulde. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 267v) VIII kalendas Iulii natifitas Sancti Iohannis Baptista

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 267v) Se godspellere lucas aƿrat on cristes bec

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 273r) ond to þam ecan gelæde þam sy ƿuldor ond lof mid fæder ond halgum gaste a on ecnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 273r) III kalendas Iulii in natale Sancti petri apostoli

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 273r) Lucas se gospellere us sæde on ðissere pistol

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 274v) Næs sƿa ðeah þis gedon onðisum andƿeardum dæge ac ƿe hit healdað on ðære nihte ðe gehatað hlafmæsse.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 274v) Item alia de petre

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 274v) Matheus se godspellere aƿrat

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 278v) Sy him ƿuldor ond lof on ealra ƿoruld aƿoruld a to ƿidan feore. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 278v) III kalendas Iulii in natale Sancte petri apostoli. Hoc est euangelium

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): (fol. 278v) Venit Iesu in partes

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 278v) Matheus se godspellere

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 281r) þæt sƿa hƿa sƿa oð scyt fram annesse ðæs geleafan þe petrus ða andette cristes þæt him ne bið getiðod naðor ne synna forgifenes ne infer þæs heofonlican rices.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 281r) Passio Apostolorum petri et pauli

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 281r) Ƿe ƿillað æfter ðisum godspelle eoƿ gereccan

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 286r) Cuð is geond eallum leodscipum þæt fela ƿundra gelumpen æt þæra apostola byrgenum ðurh ðæs hælendes tyðe þam sy ƿuldor ond lof a on ecnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 286r) II kalendas Iulii In natale Sancti Pauli apostoli

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 286r) Godes gelaðung ƿurðað

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 291v) sy lof þam ƿel ƿillendan drihtne ealra his ƿelena a onetnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 291v) passio natale sancti iacobi apostoli

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 291v) On þisum dæge ƿe ƿurþiaþ on urum lofsangum

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 295r) ond ƿurðmynt on ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 295r) De quarta euangelistas matheus marcus lucas iohannes

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 295r) Marcus se godspellere be godes dihte for to egypta lande

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 298v) Ƿe endiað þus ðas gesetnysse her ond syþam ƿel ƿillendan hælende a ƿuldor ond lof buton ælcum ende on ecnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 298v) XIII kalendas februarii passio sancti sebastiani martyris

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 298v) Sebastinus hatte sum halig godes þegen

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 306v) se þe geƿealt ealle þinc rixigende á á on ecnysse eces ƿuldres cyning. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 306v) Dominica in quadragessimo iii

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): (fol. 306v) Ductus est iesus

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 306v) Ic ƿolde eoƿ trahnian

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 311v) se þe leofað ond rixað a butan ende on ecnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 311v) Incipit de penitentia in quadragessima

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 311v) Læƿedum mannum is to ƿitne þæt ælc man

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 316r) Sy lof se lyfað ond rixað in ealra ƿoruld a ƿoruld a butan ende on ecnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 316r) Dominica III in quadgragesima

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: Incipit (Latin): (fol. 316r) Erat ihesus eiciens

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 316r) On þære mærran tide

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 321r) Uton herian urne drihten ond þæt halige ge healdan þæs us ge unne se ælmihtiga ƿealdend se þe a rixað a on ecnysse. Amen.

notes.head: Addition
notes.body: (fol. 321/23-26) þis is þæt boc þæt ic Ulf h[...]ba tale(?) ƿiþ(?) ilce mann on scyr ond clænne(?) mis min f(?)æg me to handa. Crist eoƿ h[ealde]

notes.head: Date
notes.body: s. xiin; the addition in s. xi2.

notes.head: Note
notes.body: According to Ker, the addition is on two lines immediately after the end of the homily in a hand of s. xi2.They are over an erasure of three lines of earlier writing. The form suggests a charter.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 321v) de sancto bartholomeo

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 321v) Ƿyrd ƿriteras secgaþ

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 327v) ˥ mid fulfremedum geðingðum ge ƿat to drihtne þam is ƿurðmynt ˥ ƿuldor a on ƿorulde. AMEN.

notes.head: Date
notes.body: Added in s. xi2.

notes.head: Note
notes.body: Incomplete. The title 'De Sancto bartholomeo' was added in s. xiii.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 328r) kalendas augustus passio sanctorum machabeorum

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 328r) Æfter ðam ðe alexander se egefulla

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 342v) forðan ðe hi furðon noldon ænne fugel acƿellan

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 342v) III Idus augusti passio sancti laurentii martyris

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 342v) On decius dæge þæs hreoƿan caseres

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 350r) for ðæs naman he ðroƿode mid cenum mode mænigfeade tintregu miððam þe orsorhlice on ecnysse ƿuldrað. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 350r) In assumptione sancte marie uirginis

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 350r) Men ða leofestan gehyrað nu hƿæt her segð on ðissum bocum be ðære halgan fæmnan

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 359r) ond eces ƿuldres to ðæm us gefult mige ure drihten. Amen.

notes.head: Note
notes.body: The lower half of the final folio (fol. 359r) has been removed.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 360r) III kalendas octobris dedicatio ecclesie sancti michelis archangeli

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 360r) Manegum is cuð seo halige stoƿ

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 366v) ond ðingeræ on heofonum to ðæm ælmihtigum an gode se ðe liofað ond rixað a on ecnesse. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial):

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 367r) An anginn is ealra ðinga

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 374v) ond geearniaþ mid goodum ƿeorcum þæt ece lif mid gode se þe ana on ecnisse rixaþ á á ƿorulde. Amen.

notes.head: Date
notes.body: Added in s. xi2.

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body:
(fol. 374v) Sanctus
Iohannes geseah ofer garsegc sƿilce hit land ƿære

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 377r) Se þe leofað ond rixað soðlice mid fæder ond sunu ond mid þam halgan gaste a buton ende. Amen.

notes.head: Date
notes.body: Added in s. xi2.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 378r) III Idus novembris depositio sancte martini episcopi

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 378r) Martinus se ƿoldorfulla godes andettere

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 385v) Sy oðam aƿuldor on ecere ƿorulde þe leofað ond rixað þurh hine sylf ne god. Amen.

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 385v) Excusiatio dictantis

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 385v) Fela fægere godspell ƿe forlætað

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 385v) Hio is sƿa ðeah eallful ge leaflic buton þam anum þe agustinus ƿið sæcð

notes.head: Rubric
notes.body: Rubric (initial): (fol. 386r) sancti andreae

notes.head: Incipit
notes.body: (fol. 386r) Her sigð þæt æfter þam þe drihten

notes.head: Explicit
notes.body: (fol. 394v) ond hie cƿædon an is drihten god se is hælend crist ond se halga gast þam is ƿuldor and geƿeald on þære halgan þrynnysse þurh ealra ƿorulda ƿoruld soðlice a butan ende. Amen.

objectDesc.support: Mixed. Parchment is yellowy and waxy on hairside, and very flexible. Fol. i is a Parkerian flyleaf taken from an account roll, s. xv. Fols 196-97 were originally blank leaves of another larger manuscript: traces of writing are still visible on narrow strips of the leaves formerly conjugate with them, which have been preserved to attach them together.
objectDesc.extent:
c. 271 mm x 187 mm (dimensions of all - size of leaves).
c. 215 mm x 135-107 mm (dimensions of all - size of written space).
objectDesc.layoutDescription: Ruling is drypoint, often very deeply cut on more than one leaf at a time. Single bounding lines in Quires 4-10, 20, 28-31, 45 and in parts of other quires.

handDesc.summary: The oldest part of the manuscript is by four scribes, with contemporary additions by five or six scribes. The additions from s. xi

hands.name: homily
hands.summary: This is a very round hand using a straight-cut nib. There are few abbreviations, and legibility seems the key to this scribe's stint. Laterally somewhat compressed, the rotundity of the letter forms provides the sense of ampleness to the writing. Slight forward-leaning aspect.

characters.note: a is very round with a curved tail to the right.
The e component of æ rises above the a component.
d is round-backed with a short upward stroke.
e is very rounded with an extended tongue in final position.
f has a crossbar flat on the line which transects the vertical very notably.
The tail of insular g begins in the middle of the headstroke, and the open tail is generous, curved and sweeping.
minims are even, with barely any serifs.
p has a very rounded bowl, and a short foot at the end of the descender.
s is long with a small onset stroke to the left. By fol. 367r, the head of long s is occasionally elaborately curved, particularly at line-ends.
ð has a long ascender at 60º or so, with a cross-stroke which only just transects the ascender and flicks down to the right.
y is straight-limbed with a long tail, and is consistently dotted in the middle.
ascenders have a slight wedge, which is higher on the right than the left.
descenders are straight and even.
accents are very steep.
Abbreviated þ has a long cross-stroke which curves up to the right.
punctus sits just above the ruled line.
st ligatures are avoided.
The nota begins at minim height and descends below the line at 90º.

hands.name: homily
hands.description: fols 322-27. At top left of upper margin of fol. 323v 'ae[eth]elric' is written in same script and same ink as Scribe 10. At fol. 323v in upper and left margins there are erased notes.
hands.summary: This scribe appears to be attempting to emulate the round hand of Scribe 9, but is a much less competent scribe: the even-ness of Scribe 9 is not apparent, and there is a shakiness to the duct of Scribe 10 that suggests slowness in the copying process, and a lack of proficiency. This is confirmed by scratchy letters and ink blotches (fol. 322r/18-19). Some angularity in letter forms such as

characters.note: d is round-backed with a low back which flicks up to the right.
f has a cross-stroke, flat on the line, piercing the stem.
s is consistently low, with one uncial form as capital, but by fol. 323r, long s with an elaborate rounded head is evinced.
ð has a cross-stroke to the right of the ascender only, curving down at the right, though by fol. 326r it pierces ascender.
Straight-limbed, dotted y has a distinctive flick to the right by fol. 323r.
Square capital N sometimes occurs in final position, sometimes elaborate to fill space.
The square form of capital H is notable.
ascenders have slight tags to the left.
descenders are relatively short and occasionally curve slightly to the left or have flat feet extending across the bottom.
The ˥ is large and at 90º. It sits on the line, above minim height.
The abbreviated þ for 'þæt' has a macron only from the ascender and finishes with flick up to the left.
punctus on the line. punctus versus and punctus interrogativus are used.
Low, flat hyphen at line-end.
st ligature is avoided.

hands.name: homily
hands.summary: The rubric and initial S here are red, with red infill on some of the small capitals on that folio. If this is another scribe (and not the same as Scribe 9, which seems very likely), there is a round duct, and a mostly upright aspect. Once again, the writing is slightly compressed laterally, but the bodies of the letters are abundantly rounded. There are few abbreviations, and legibility seems the critical feature.

characters.note: a is very round with a curved tail to the right.
The e component of æ rises above the a component.
d is round-backed with an short-ish upward stroke.
e is very rounded with an extended tongue in final position.
f has a crossbar flat on the line which transects the vertical very notably.
The tail of insular g begins in the middle of the headstroke, and the open tail is curved and usually closed.
minims are even, with small feet to the right.
p has a very rounded bowl, and a short foot at the end of the descender.
Long and low s, with a slightly hooked shoulder.
ð has a long ascender at 60º or so, with a cross-stroke which only extends from the right of the ascender; the cross-stroke flicks down to the right.
y is straight-limbed with a long tail, and is consistently dotted in the middle.
ascenders are wedged.
descenders are straight and even.
accents are very steep.
Abbreviated þ has a long cross-stroke which curves up to the right.
The punctus sits hust above the ruled line.
st ligatures are avoided.
The nota begins at minim height and descends below the line at 90º.

hands.name: additions
hands.description: Numerous interventions, beginning with extensive additions to the original Table of Contents by the

binding: Binding of s. xii. Ker (1957) notes that the previous binding (s. xvi) was presumably of dark skin as it is referred to as 'Liber niger' in CCCC 421, p. v and Cleopatra B. xiii, fol. 1v (p. 82).

history.origin: The origin of the manuscript is unknown. The spellings of the late eleventh-century additions suggest that they were written in the west of England.
history.provenance: The annotations throughout by the Tremulous Hand show that the manuscript was at Worcester by s. xiii at the latest.
history.acquisition: S (8) in the list of manuscripts bequeathed by Parker to Corpus Christi College.

admin: Manuscript described by Elaine Treharne with the assistance of Zöe Enstone, Hollie Morgan and Johanna Green (2010; 2013).
